forum.name: Creating your vision for using OER to improve student practice
forum.intro:
As discussed in the presentation, OER move us toward more open instruction.

  • What is your vision for an open science class?
  • What does open pedagogy mean to you?
  • What practices will guide your vision of open instruction?
  • What practices will you help students develop in your open science class?

Review the Science & Engineering Practices Checklist (the file will download to your computer). Consider the questions above and revise your checklist based on your responses.

Here, post an explanation of how you changed your checklist, what you added or deleted, and why.

Upload a copy of your checklist as it has been revised so others can see your revisions. 

This is a good opportunity for you to see how other teachers look at this process. There is no right or wrong checklist here; this is a tool to help you in the reviewing, planning, and implementation process.
